data.meta_description: Actress Marisa Pavan, born on Jun 19, 1932 starred in The Rose Tattoo, The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit, Drum Beat, John Paul Jones, Down Three Dark Streets, Diane, Solomon and Sheba, The Midnight Story, What Price Glory, Appointment with a Shadow
data.text:
Marisa Pavan Overview:

Actress, Marisa Pavan, was born Maria Luisa Pierangeli on Jun 19, 1932 in Cagliari, Italy. As of December 2023, Marisa Pavan was 91 years old.

HONORS and AWARDS:

.

Although Pavan was nominated for one Oscar, she never won a competitive Academy Award.

Academy Awards

YearAwardFilm nameRoleResult1955Best Supporting ActressThe Rose Tattoo (1955)Rosa Della RoseNominated

.

Marisa Pavan Quotes:

Pvt. Lewisohn: You speak English very well.

Nicole Bouchard: Sister Cecile does not permit that we speak French in English class.

Pvt. Lewisohn: Well, I can tell you how glad I am that you've Sister Cecile for a teacher.

Nicole Bouchard: Thank you, also my father does not permit that I speak to American soldier... in any language.

Abishag: How interesting your encampment is. Are your people always so carefree and gay?

Sheba: We enjoy life and pleasure. Don't you?

Abishag: Oh yes, we do. But we are... an austere people. We tend to be more serious.

Sheba: And you king... is he also serious?

Abishag: King Solomon has a great responsibility.
